body: @henchi69 She got upset/ jealous that the dude still has feelings for his ex-wife. Went back home and met the dude that she had a one night stand with back when she broke up. (Back then they both broke up with their respective partners so they made out to try and forget about their ex s (and they were drunk lol)). Realised she still has feelings for the main guy. She then met the ex-wife's mother, came to another realisation, met the main guy, both confess their love for one another. Happy Marriage.
oh she tries to cheat but can't go forward with it and the guy she tried doing it with also respected the fact and didnt continue....is what i think
so wait she cheats on him towards the end and gets back together?? i need to know what happens
I want a translation for this one ;-;
